text-1.title: About US
text-1.text: You want an original design, tailored to your needs? The music agency NOISA out all the stops for your project, with a unique web design. The result?

text-2.text: NOISA Music Agency 18, Main Road, 8th Floor, Melbourne, Australia +01 800 559 6580 [circle_button link="http://twitter.com" icon="twitter" target="_blank" classes=""][circle_button link="http://facebook.com" icon="facebook" target="_blank" classes=""][circle_button link="http://soundcloud.com" icon="soundcloud" target="_blank" classes=""][circle_button link="http://instagram.com" icon="instagram" target="_blank" classes=""]
